alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Marion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 3:44PM EST until March 09 at 9:43AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River. Eel River at Bowling Green. .Ongoing and renewed flooding will continue or develop along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers over the next 24 to 48 hours and beyond. River stages are rising again due to the one to over two and a half inches of rain received from Saturday night through this morning. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Noblesville. * WHEN...From this evening to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Extensive flooding begins in Riverwood area. Agricultural flooding is in progress as well as flooding of both the Riverbend and White River campgrounds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 15.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by later this evening.
